channel.title: no fire knob on display to kill garg
channel.description:
I've stuck here because there's a bug. I don't see any fire knob. Somebody help :slight_smile: here is an image
[url='https://wstaw.org/w/1zJe/']https://wstaw.org/w/1zJe/[/url]

item.title: no fire knob on display to kill garg
item.dc:creator: Mistiq
item.description:
For those, who will experience the same problem - reinstalling the game fixes this bug)

Read full topic
item.source: no fire knob on display to kill garg

item.title: no fire knob on display to kill garg
item.dc:creator: Mistiq
item.description:
Chickenprotector:

What they said, after you’ve put the area where you want it to be, keep pressing your left-mouse button at the bottom center.

Well, I’ve tried everything suggested in this topic. But it’s still only two crosshairs on the screen where I must point the monster and no opportunity to fire.
Tomorrow I’ll reinstall the game. It’s the only chance

Read full topic
item.source: no fire knob on display to kill garg

item.title: no fire knob on display to kill garg
item.dc:creator: Chickenprotector
item.description:
dky.tehkingd.u:

Click the screen with your mouse, as if you’re actually using a mouse.

It’s really weird. And it’s not uncommon that the screen gets all screwed up and won’t detect your button presses. If that happens, just keep trying.

What they said, after you’ve put the area where you want it to be, keep pressing your left-mouse button at the bottom center.

Read full topic
